summary: A Small Vanilla Body NPC inspired of Albedo(Anime: OVerlord)
descriptionHtml:
Its my Fitst modded NPC so its not rly perfect in version v1

i got help from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/38721495]TAOXUE[/url]﻿ that the follow function works

u can find in per days an Custom Body remake from my mod in his mod galery

to get the NPC like on my Screens u need to download and install before per mods


INSTALL:
1.Download and Install/activate all linked Mods:
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49847]Astaroth Horns Redone[/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57646]Animated Wings[/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29707]Black Overlord Armor [/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61466]Demon Eyes[/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69786]Darius Battleaxe[/url]﻿
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11662]NPC Clothes Changer and Maintainer[/url]

2. Download my Mod

3. Copy all the files from the .rar in your Skyrim Data Folder

4. U can find the NPC in Whiterun Jorrvaskr
author: ILoVeMySKIlL
